roleset.name: to exercise sovereign power, dominate
roleset.note: REIGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reign' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reign.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: President Carlos Salinas de Gortari used the army [*-3] to oust La Quina , who [*T*-1]reigned for 28 years over a graft-riddled empire that [*T*-2] made state-run Petroleos Mexicanos , or Pemex , one of the world 's most inefficient oil companies .
example.arg: over a graft-riddled empire that [*T*-2] made state-run Petroleos Mexicanos , or Pemex , one of the world 's most inefficient oil companies
